hotels.title: Contemporary Cambodia Novotel Stay Overlooking Gulf of Thailand with Infinity Pool & Three Restaurants
hotels.description: Perched where jungle-clad hills meet turquoise waters, this slice of beachfront paradise blends locally inspired details with elegant luxury. The showstopper infinity pool practically spills into the Gulf of Thailand, while three foodie havens will keep your tastebuds dancing: enjoy Gourmet Bar & Caf√©'s light bites, Aqua Bar & Grill's Asian delights and Food Exchange's globe-trotting cuisine with killer sunset views. Welcome to Cambodia's most happening beach town, where adventure starts at your doorstep. Roll out of bed onto the powder-soft sands of Ochheuteal Beach, or hop on a boat to discover the secret coves of Koh Rong's paradise islands. For nature lovers, Ream National Park's mangrove forests and hidden waterfalls are just a short ride away - perfect for those \"pinch me\" moments in paradise.
